name: frakton-ng
description: Frakton NG — Design System Angular: componentes UI modernos, acessíveis e escaláveis para acelerar o desenvolvimento de aplicações.
author: Samuel Alejandro <samuelalejandro.dev@gmail.com>

scripts.publish:major: pnpm run update-version:major && pnpm run build && cd dist && pnpm publish --access public --git-checks=false
scripts.publish:minor: pnpm run update-version:minor && pnpm run build && cd dist && pnpm publish --access public --git-checks=false
scripts.publish:patch: pnpm run update-version:patch && pnpm run build && cd dist && pnpm publish --access public --git-checks=false
scripts.publish:major:next: pnpm run update-version:major && pnpm run build && cd dist && pnpm publish --access public --git-checks=false --tag next
scripts.publish:minor:next: pnpm run update-version:minor && pnpm run build && cd dist && pnpm publish --access public --git-checks=false --tag next
scripts.publish:patch:next: pnpm run update-version:patch && pnpm run build && cd dist && pnpm publish --access public --git-checks=false --tag next
